root.name: Beware Planet Earth
root.description: Heed the warning from the red planet, Earthlings! The Martians are about to strike our beloved planet to take our single most valuable resource: cows! Protect Barney's "ladies" in this colorful and whimsical tower defense game! - Full Story Mode (46 levels over 4 seasons), plus 18 bonus challenges! - Intense action! Grab your Zapper to attack the Martians and overpower your machines! - 20 wacky machines, from the classic defense tower to the Helicowpter! - Over 20 quirky Martians, from the Metalhead to the Mad Scientist to the Ninja! - 25 Achievements! - Cows! - Talking outhouse! (wait, what?!)
